name: Baxton_Studio_Petito_Contemporary_2-tier_White_Faux_Leather_Upholstered_Shoe_Cabinet
reviews: First, it took 3 shipments of sets of two (6 racks) to get two that were not broken upon delivery. The shelves are too small for my sneakers/tennis shoes. Probably good for kids' shoes in the front closset n some flip flops of mine
What an exceptional cabinet. Great quality for a low price that I couldn’t find anywhere else. Highly recommend for quality and value.
This is a very nice looking cabinet. It stores our shoes perfectly and was easy to assemble. Good quality construction, especially for the price. Would recommend.
description: This Petito White 2-Tier Leather Upholstered Storage Shoe Cabinet, with metal pull out handles, provides you with ample shoe storage and a comfortable place to sit while you removing your shoes. It could be displayed side by side as a seating bench or stacked up for small space concerns. This shoe cabinet will add style and elegance to any home and takes shoe storage to a whole new level. Contemporary shoe cabinetMDF frame with white faux leather upholstery Can be used as a seating bench, seating capacity 150 lbs 2-tier fold out shoe rack with shoe storage capacity 12 pairs of adult shoes Metal pull-out handlesOptions of vertical and horizontal displaying the shoe cabinetSet includes: One (1) 2-tier shoe cabinetMaterials: Faux leather, foam, MDFFinish: Black plastic legs Upholstery color: White Upholstery fill: Foam paddingDrawer dimensions: 12 inches high x 21.25 inches wide x 4 inches deep Dimensions: 32.8 inches high x 24.1 inches wide x 12.1 inches deep Product Features: Includes HardwareMaterial: Faux Leather, WoodStyle: ContemporaryDresser Type: Shoe CabinetAssembly: Assembly RequiredFinish: White FinishColor: WhiteStyleContemporaryMaterialFaux Leather, WoodFinishWhite FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteDresser TypeShoe CabinetProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware
